name: RGB (Jerome Thil)
description:
RGB is an action game in which you can switch between three characters Red, Green and Blue to solve differents fights, puzzles and platforming area to succeed corrupting the PC your are attacking.

THE GAME WAS MEANT TO BE PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER

Download instruction

1 - Download the Zip file

2 - Extract the Zip file

3 - Execute the file "RGB.exe"
